extends greenfoot.World
    This class handles all the gamestate and links all the objects to one another.

    • Method Detail

      • updateHighScore

        public void updateHighScore​(int score,
                            int highscore)
        This method takes in a score and a highscore and does some logic checks to see if the data file should store the new highscore.
        Parameters:
        score - The score that the user was able to achieve in this run.
        highscore - The highest score the user has achieved

      • updateGtaMode

        public void updateGtaMode​(boolean selected)
        This method updates the gta mode data peice in the data file
        Parameters:
        selected - Is the gta mode set to true or false

      • addText

        public void addText​(java.lang.String t,
                    greenfoot.Font f,
                    greenfoot.Color c,
                    int x,
                    int y,
                    boolean bold,
                    boolean center)
        This method adds a text to the screen.
        Parameters:
        t - The text to be rendered onto the screen.
        f - The font of the text
        c - The color of the text
        x - The x position of the text
        y - The y position of the text
        bold - Does the font have the 'bold' property
        center - Centeres the text if on the x & y if true

      • act

        public void act()
        Act - do whatever the Scene wants to do. This method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the environment.
        Overrides:
        act in class greenfoot.World
